headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  POSNER, RUTH LEE

lead_paragraph: POSNER--Ruth Lee, nee Glass, died January 27 at age 88. Ruth is survived by Norman, her husband and best friend, from whom she was inseparable for 67 years, by children Henry, Michael, and Lillian, daughters-in-law Virginia and Andria, and grandchildren Rachel, Alyssa, and Joshua. Ruth graduated from Temple University where she met Norman, then in medical school. They married in 1947 and raised their family in New Rochelle. Ruth was active in Project Hope and Women's American ORT. Ruth was devoted to friends, adored her family, and loved to be surrounded by loved ones. Ruth's worth was "far above jewels." Donations in her memory to Beth El Synagogue, New Rochelle, NY. Shiva at Ruth and Norman's home until Monday, February 3.
